Title: to_char
Description: Converts number to string according to the given format; available for integer, bigint, numeric, real, double precision.

Title: to_date
Description: Converts string to date according to the given format.

Title: to_number
Description: Converts string to numeric according to the given format.

Title: to_timestamp
Feature: to_timestamp ( text, text ) → timestamp with time zone
Description: Converts string to time stamp according to the given format. (See also to_timestamp(double precision) in Table 9.33.)
